alert.note: Alert for Brown (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:26PM CDT until April 14 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River Above Springfield. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Tuesday, the stage was 23.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 PM CDT Tuesday was 23.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday morning and continue falling to 16.9 feet next Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.7 feet on 06/21/1991. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
